title: The Timeline of Lord Rama's Appearance | Sri Suvyukta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.key_quote: Lord Ramachandra appeared 17.28 million years ago.
segments.summary: The lecture begins by stating when Lord Rama appeared and then introduces the Sankalpa Mantra as a way to locate events in space and time.

segments.key_quote: And like this it goes on to mention the month, the masa, the vara, the tithi, etc.
segments.summary: This segment provides an example of the Sankalpa Mantra and explains how it mentions various aspects of time like month, masa, vara, and tithi.

segments.key_quote: What this mantra essentially does is, to locate the space and time of the event.
segments.summary: This segment explains how the Sankalpa Mantra locates our position in the universe and in time, focusing on the concept of Samvatsaras and their cycle.

segments.key_quote: So, we are now in the 28th Kali Yuga.
segments.summary: The lecture expands on the Vedic time scale, explaining Mahayugas, the current Kali Yuga, the concept of Manus, and the duration of a day of Brahma.

segments.key_quote: And one Pararth of Brahma is 50 such years which comes to 155.5 trillion years and Brahma lives for 2 such Pararth's which comes to a total of 311 trillion years.
segments.summary: This segment continues the explanation of the Vedic time scale, discussing Pararthas and relating it to the appearance of Lord Krishna and Sri Chaitanya Mahaprabhu within that timeline.

segments.key_quote: We should not go by hearsay, but we should go by what the Acharyas and the Shastras, the Vedic scriptures have stated.
segments.summary: The lecture addresses misconceptions about when Lord Rama appeared and clarifies the correct time based on scriptures and the teachings of Srila Rupakaswami, concluding with the statement that Lord Rama appeared 17.28 million years ago.
